name: ChatGPT - GPT4 Ai Chatbot
title: ChatGPT - GPT4 Ai Chatbot

api_list.name: Chat
api_list.description:
1. To start a new chat or get a one-time response, send a POST request to the /chat endpoint with a JSON object that includes a query property containing the text of the message you want to send:

```
{
   "query" : "How are you?",
   "wordLimit":"256" (optional)
}
```

2. To get a response based on previous chats, send a POST request to the /ask endpoint with a JSON object that includes both a query property containing the text of the message you want to send and a conversationId property containing the ID of the conversation you want to retrieve the response for:

```
{
   "query" : "How are you?",
   "conversationId": "<Id from 1st response>"
}
```

![](https://gcdnb.pbrd.co/images/AKTgGLcyFyWv.png)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-gpt4-ai-chatbot.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-gpt4-ai-chatbot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-gpt4-ai-chatbot.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-gpt4-ai-chatbot.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
